name: Random Trainer
description: Bring it on! My Pok√©mon and I are always up for a challenge. Let's battle to the very end with random pokemon teams!

name: Nishakar Kumar
description: I wield the power of the most feared Pokemon. With its shadowy tendrils and piercing red eyes, it strikes fear into the bravest.

name: Vibhu Yadav
description: My Giratina, a being that commands respect and fear. Those who dare to stand against my team do so at their own peril.
